DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim develop , test feasibility efficacy , manual base , cognitive behaviour therapy ( CBT ) treatment Hoarding Disorder ( HD ) deliver group format combine Internet support system . The investigator ' secondary aim investigate neurocognitive profile participant treatment order explore treatment might impact neurocognitive function certain neurocognitive profile predict outcome . For primary aim , investigator hypothesize treatment acceptable participant decrease symptom hoard . Regarding secondary aim , investigator hypothesize deficiency executive functioning , measure neurocognitive battery , reduce upon completion treatment baseline executive function associate treatment outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Supported Group Cognitive Behavior Therapy ( CBT ) Hoarding Disorder ( HD )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Outpatients Male female ≥ 18 year age Currently live Stockholm county Primary diagnosis Hoarding Disorder accord DSM5 Signed inform consent Regular access computer Internet ability use Internet Access mobile phone Able participate group session Exclusion criterion : Current substance dependence misuse Life time bipolar disorder psychosis Severe selfrated depressive symptom ( score ≥ 35 MADRSS ) Suicidal ideation ( score > 4 item 9 MADRSS ) Psychotropic medication change within two month prior treatment Other current psychological treatment could affect hoard symptom Has receive 10 CBT session Hoarding Disorder
